name: Dragon Ball Z: Chou Saiya Densetsu
summary: Also known as Dragon Ball Z: The Legend of the Super Saiyan, this is a Japan-only SNES RPG. It was the first Dragon Ball Z game on the SNES, and also the console's only card-based combat game. It also remains the series' only RPG.

alternative_names.name: Dragon Ball Z: Super Saiya Densetsu
Dragon Ball Z: Legend of the Super Saiyan
